alert.note: Alert for Cass; Mason (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 1:26PM CST until February 26 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River near Chandlerville affecting Cass and Mason Counties. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River near Chandlerville. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to late Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 454.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 457.3 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 456.6 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sangamon River Chandlerville 456.6 454.8 Tue 1 pm CST 456.3 457.2 457.1 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
